thread.title: MLB TV crew mocks girls who'd rather take selfies than watch game
thread.title_full: MLB TV crew mocks girls who'd rather take selfies than watch game

title: MLB TV crew mocks girls who'd rather take selfies than watch game
text:
Updated: 9:02 a.m. Friday, Oct. 2, 2015 | Posted: 8:30 a.m. Friday, Oct. 2, 2015 MLB TV crew mocks girls who'd rather take selfies than watch game Sponsored Links By Cox Media Group National Content Desk 
Normally you go to a Major League Baseball game to watch the game, but there was a group of girls who decided to spend their time focused on their selfies and phones rather than the ballgame. 
Their selfie-centeredness caught the attention of the Diamondbacks TV crew, who mocked them to no end during the broadcast . 
Your browser does not support iframes. 
The Diamondbacks then got into the game by posting a selfie to its Twitter feed . Yep, we got the experts themselves to take a #selfie on our @Snapchat ! (Username: dbacks) pic.twitter.com/2jIS2uqYoC
